quote: The best advice was literally to get in and do and the rest will figure itself out.
why_clipworthy: It emphasizes action over analysis, encouraging new agents to dive in.
suggested_hook: Struggling to find your footing in real estate? Here's the best advice to get started.

quote: We are so lucky to get to do what we do, which is help people honestly and ethically make the largest decision of their life.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the rewarding nature of real estate, inspiring agents to appreciate their role.
suggested_hook: Feeling burnt out? Remember why being a REALTOR is a privilege.
